GSD.description:
ARM: mmp: Fix failure to remove sram device

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.276 by commit 82d919fbdea37f2281457c97fde5a56ed6265e61. For more details please see the references link.
